name: Pop Island - Let's Code !!!
description: Pop Island - Let's code is a playground of code. It's the perfected place to learn to code or play with this amazing power. For the future it's a great investment !!! 15 tutorials and 4 build-in games are available ! Pop Island returns and opens all the doors of creativity. In front of you, the ocean of possibilities...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 620, Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram compatible OpenGL 4.3 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
